ai-anya-e0105n18:1_1: And all the dwellings there is fearful, snare, and the dwellings that were because of the great hermit.
ai-anya-e0105n18:1_2: They’ve prohibited their wraps and disappointed, and they approached their dwelling place on account of their dwellings.
ai-anya-e0105n18:1_3: they say, ‘There are trainees of lion, king of beasts, reed, venerate, and gathering alms-food! Only boats, wrap garments, and a turban for them. But they don’t look after their diot.
ai-anya-e0105n18:1_4: And because they had a wrap garments prepared for the five hundred monks, the or two monks, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty monks, a thorn boat.’
ai-anya-e0105n18:2_0: She would be found from the most senior monks, who were friends, companions, and associates with them.
ai-anya-e0105n18:2_1: Moreover, the countryside is the southern ocean.
ai-anya-e0105n18:2_2: donors of the Buddhas, his teachers, and his foundations shallow are cleared away. And they will pull out and place it for their teacher’s instructions.
ai-anya-e0105n18:2_3: They would not be able to know the venerate the Buddha, the dragon, and the rain of Shady.
ai-anya-e0105n18:3_0: Of those who don’t know or see any criticism in their own life, that for what the eighth day.
ai-anya-e0105n18:3_1: That’s why they’re looking for ahead in debate, and so on their own assembly.
ai-anya-e0105n18:3_2: For this is what you do to go to heaven, while your dwelling you wish.’
ai-anya-e0105n18:3_3: ‘That’s why the Buddha has laid down the burden, achieved their own goal, utterly ended the fetters of rebirth, and doesn’t let go of hope to understand it.’
ai-anya-e0105n18:4_0: And that’s how the rod is done.
ai-anya-e0105n18:4_1: ‘This is why he has now been born of his awakening; the Buddha awakened for themselves; that’s why he’s strong in any direction. For this is called a strong brewer’s menstruation pad. Please leave each other, neither too tight nor too loose.
